channel.title: aar on heinika
channel.description: Recent content in aar on heinika

item.title: Add aar to jcenter
item.description: 添加 com.github.dcendents.android-maven github 地址：https://github.com/dcendents/android-maven-gradle-plugin 添加这个插件主要是为了生成 aar 文件。 Modification to the standard Maven plugin to be compatible with android-library projects (aar). 添加插件支持 Using the plugins DSL: plugins { id "com.github.dcendents.android-maven" version "2.1" } Using legacy plugin application: buildscript { repositories { maven { url "https://plugins.gradle.org/m2/" } } dependencies { classpath "com.github.dcendents:android-maven-gradle-plugin:2.1" } } apply plugin: "com.github.dcendents.android-maven" 设置包名和版本 You can set the maven groupId and version in the script build.
